REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3551 reute r f BC-CIRCLE-K-<CKP>-TO-BUY 10-20 0047

TEXT.TITLE: CIRCLE K <CKP> TO BUY UP TO THREE MLN SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Circle K Corp said it may purchase up to three mln shares of its common stock. A company spokesman said Circle K has 52.6 mln shares outstanding. Circle K said the purchases would be made on the open market Reuter
